title: Ep: 008 - The Creative Process of Interior Design and Styling
description: In this episode of Architecture, Design, & Photography, we sit down for a conversation with Interior Stylist & Designer Krista Stokes. We talk about the creative process, the inspiration behind Krista's work and her approach to working with clients.
author: info@trentbell.com (Trent Bell)
content:encoded: In this episode of Architecture, Design, & Photography, we sit down for a conversation with Interior Stylist & Designer Krista Stokes. We talk about the creative process, the inspiration behind Krista's work and her approach to working with clients.
